description: Sirenes/Seirenoussai Inss. (modern Le Sirenuse or Li Galli) is an archipelago off the Amalfi Coast of Italy. In Greek mythology, the islands were home to the Sirens who tempted sailors, including Odysseus.

locations.details: The Greek hero Odysseus was said to pass Le Sirenuse, the supposed home of the Sirens, as quickly as possible.
